# 2.5.1 65-byte Packet Authentication Using GCM-AES-128
AEAD: aes-128-gcm
KEY: 013FE00B5F11BE7F866D0CBBC55A7A90
NONCE: 7CFDE9F9E33724C68932D612
IN:

CT:
TAG: 217867E50C2DAD74C28C3B50ABDF695A
